ghostPost.title: DSNP Update: September 2021
ghostPost.excerpt: In September, DSNP.org hosted our first developer summit. It was an amazing success for all of the people we met, the projects we saw demoed, the history we learned, and the knowledge everyone shared. We look forward to more opportunities to spend time with this community.
ghostPost.custom_excerpt: In September, DSNP.org hosted our first developer summit. It was an amazing success for all of the people we met, the projects we saw demoed, the history we learned, and the knowledge everyone shared. We look forward to more opportunities to spend time with this community.
ghostPost.plaintext:
In September, DSNP.org [http://DSNP.org] hosted our first developer summit. It
was an amazing success for all of the people we met, the projects we saw demoed,
the history we learned, and the knowledge everyone shared. We look forward to
more opportunities to spend time with this community. As always, we invite you
to add your comments and questions to the discussions at 
forums.projectliberty.io [https://forums.projectliberty.io/].

Summary of progress:
 * Final chain selection underway.
 * The first DSNP Summit for Decentralized Infrastructure was a success. Looking
   forward to additional conferences and conversations.
 * Read some recent news
   [https://www.fastcompany.com/90679607/facebook-alternative-project-liberty-frank-mccourt-blockchain-billionare] 
   about Project Liberty and DSNP.

Example client

 * Improved documentation, onboarding, and usability for those new to DSNP.

Spec

 * Official release of Version 1.0 of DSNP on Ethereum.
 * Updated Roadmap.

Upcoming:
 * Updates on chain selection
   [https://forums.projectliberty.io/t/update-on-chain-selection/133].
ghostPost.html:
In September, DSNP.org hosted our first developer summit. It was an amazing success for all of the people we met, the projects we saw demoed, the history we learned, and the knowledge everyone shared. We look forward to more opportunities to spend time with this community. As always, we invite you to add your comments and questions to the discussions at forums.projectliberty.io.

Summary of progress:

  • Final chain selection underway.
  • The first DSNP Summit for Decentralized Infrastructure was a success. Looking forward to additional conferences and conversations.
  • Read some recent news about Project Liberty and DSNP.

Example client

  • Improved documentation, onboarding, and usability for those new to DSNP.

Spec

  • Official release of Version 1.0 of DSNP on Ethereum.
  • Updated Roadmap.

Upcoming:

  • Updates on chain selection.
